title: Simulation window not scaling correctly on 4K display

content.raw: I installed Gazebo 9.11.0 for my Dell XPS, but the simulation window does not scale properly, as only the top-left part of the screen is rendering. I am using 4K display with 3840x2160 resolution and 2x scaling on KDE Neon. When using the 1x scaling, the window scales correctly. Is there anything that could be done without going to smaller resolution?
